queryData.sublistquery: select sub.USER_ID, sub.SUBSCRIBER_ID as SUBSCRIBER_ID from AM_SUBSCRIBER sub {{tablesNames}} where sub.TENANT_ID='{{tenantId}}' {{subscriptionCondition}}
queryData.apilistquery: select API_NAME, API_ID from AM_API where CONTEXT {{contextCondition}} {{createdBy}}
queryData.mainquery: select count(app.APPLICATION_ID) as count, app.CREATED_TIME as CREATED_TIME, app.NAME, app.CREATED_BY as time from AM_APPLICATION app, AM_SUBSCRIBER sub {{subscriptionTable}} where sub.SUBSCRIBER_ID=app.SUBSCRIBER_ID AND sub.TENANT_ID='{{tenantId}}' {{subscription}} {{apiName}} {{apiProvider}} {{subscriberId}} AND app.CREATED_TIME between '{{timeFrom}}' AND '{{timeTo}}' group by app.CREATED_TIME, app.APPLICATION_ID, app.CREATED_BY, app.NAME
